text: Thanks to Entertainment Weekly, fans are now getting their first official look at Nicole Kidman as Queen Atlanna in James Wan ’ s “ Aquaman. ” EW ’ s cover shows Kidman, Jason Momoa and Amber Heard in their respective characters. Kidman is wearing a light blue suit with a stunning head piece. In March 2017, Kidman confirmed she was playing Aquaman ’ s mother in “ Aquaman, ” and there was a simple reason as to why she wanted to take on the role.
